data.title: Jesus Franco
data.text:
AKA Jesús Franco Ocádiz

Born: 12-May-1930

Birthplace: Madrid, Spain

Died: 2-Apr-2013

Location of death: Malaga, Spain

Cause of death: Stroke

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: Hispanic

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Film Director

Nationality: Spain

Executive summary: Vampyros Lesbos

Wife: Nicole Guettard (div.)

Wife: Lina Romay (actress)
